openwebui_variables.name: AUDIO_STT_ENGINE
openwebui_variables.description: Specifies the Speech-to-Text engine to use.

openwebui_variables.name: WHISPER_LANGUAGE
openwebui_variables.description:
Specifies the ISO 639-1 language Whisper uses for STT (ISO 639-2 for Hawaiian and Cantonese). Whisper predicts the language by default.

### Speech-to-Text (OpenAI)

openwebui_variables.name: WHISPER_MODEL
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the Whisper model to use for Speech-to-Text. The backend used is faster_whisper with quantization to `int8`.

openwebui_variables.name: WHISPER_MODEL_AUTO_UPDATE
openwebui_variables.description: Toggles automatic update of the Whisper model.

openwebui_variables.name: WHISPER_MODEL_DIR
openwebui_variables.description: Specifies the directory to store Whisper model files.

openwebui_variables.name: WHISPER_VAD_FILTER
openwebui_variables.description: Specifies whether to apply a Voice Activity Detection (VAD) filter to Whisper Speech-to-Text.
